mn105:17.2: anabhāvaṃkate → anabhāvakate (bj, pts1) | anabhāvaṅgate (s2, s3, km)
mn105:18.4: atathaṃ samānaṃ → atathaṃ sa mānaṃ (bj) | atthaṃ samānaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1), Evaṃmāni → evaṃ mānī (bj, pts1, mr) | evamādi (s1-3, km)
mn105:19.6: Saupādisesoti → anupādisesoti (s1-3, km, pts1), jānamāno → maññamāno (bj, pts1)
